content:
On the social network, one of the accounts spread false information, called the Border Office.

About thisreportedState Border Service of Ukraine.

It is noted that the attackers use symbolism similar to the DPSU.

Border guards have warned that false information and fake accounts can use fraudsters or propaganda, or intelligence agencies of the aggressor country for profit, compromise of state authorities of Ukraine or conduct information and psychological operations.

“We urge to check the news and messages that are distributed on behalf of the authorities and to trust only official sources of information. Official DSSU page -https://dpsu.gov.ua. Official Pages of the State Tax Servicesocial networks», - the message reads.

As reported by the Armyinform, instead of risking your own money can be usedRecruitment centers of the Ministry of DefenseSeven of which have been opened in Ukraine: in Lviv, Poltava, Zaporozhye and two in Dnipro and Kharkiv.
title: "Pass across the border for Donat": DPSU warned of a fake on social networks
description: This was reported by the State Border Service of Ukraine. It is noted that the attackers ...
author: Army Inform
